errors.name: AlreadyInitialized
errors.msg: Th program has already been initialied.

errors.name: TitleTooLong
errors.msg: Title exceeds the maximum length of 64 characters.

errors.name: DescriptionTooLong
errors.msg: Description exceeds the maximum length of 512 characters.

errors.name: ImageUrlTooLong
errors.msg: Image URL exceeds the maximum length of 256 characters.

errors.name: InvalidGoalAmount
errors.msg: Invalid goal amount. Goal must be greater than zero.

errors.name: InvalidDonationAmount
errors.msg: Donation amount must be at least 1 SOL.

errors.name: InvalidWithdrawalAmount
errors.msg: Withdrawal amount must be at least 1 SOL.

errors.name: InvalidPlatformAddress
errors.msg: The provided platform address is invalid.
